series_description: Documents the receipt of an item or forwarding of an item to another office; no other action is taken or expected of the forwarding office.
retention_statement: 3 Months after end of calendar year

series_description: Documents the routine operation of an office. Includes routine correspondence, memoranda, notes and handwritten messages. Does not include records related to any major function of the agency.
retention_statement: 0 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Administrative Process Act (APA) Regulatory Review Records
series_description: This series documents compliance with the Administrative Process Act
retention_statement: 5 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Agendas, Schedules and Informational Documentation for Meetings
series_description: This series documents the publishing of public notices of meetings, proposed schedules, along with materials reviewed or used by the board/commission/conference. May also include other items presented to the board/commission/conference or introduced by board/commission/conference members. Does not include materials used by regulatory boards in decision making. Refer to records series 100338 and 100339 for Minutes
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Agreements, Memorandums of Understanding (MOU) and Non-Fiscal Contracts
series_description: This series consists of signed, binding agreements, other than contracts involving procurement or payment of monies. The agreements may be between departments within the agency, other government agencies, localities, business entities or an individual or group of individuals.
retention_statement: 3 Years after expiration

series_description: This series consists of reports prepared by or for the agency addressing the "state" of the agency, including goals, targets, objectives and finances
Documents the printing or publishing of calendars of agency heads intended for limited or general distribution.
retention_statement: 5 Years after last action

series_description: This series documents the printing or publishing of calendars of public officials intended for limited or general distribution.
retention_statement: 1 Year after last action

series_description: This series documents the work and reports of consultants hired by the agency.
retention_statement: 3 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents performance and conformance with contract stipulations not of a fiscal nature
retention_statement: 5 Years after termination

series_description: This series documents contractual obligations of the agency or owed to the agency
retention_statement: 5 Years after termination

series_description: This series consists of incoming and outgoing letters, memoranda, faxes, notes and their attachments, in any physical format including, but not limited to, paper and e-mail. Also refer to record series 012019, "correspondence Files - Routine, Administrative."

series_title: Correspondence/Subject Files: Board Members - Except Chairpersons
series_description: This series consists of incoming and outgoing letters, memoranda, faxes, notes and their attachments, in any physical format including, but not limited to, paper and e-mail.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Correspondence/Subject Files: Boards Mandated by Code of Virginia or Virginia
series_description: Administrative Code - Chairpersons This series consists of incoming and outgoing letters, memorandum, faxes, notes and their attachments, in any physical format including, but not limited to, paper and e-mail.

series_title: Correspondence/Subject Files: Department or Division Heads - Historically
series_description: Significant This series consists of incoming and outgoing letters, memoranda, faxes, notes and their attachments of a historically significant nature not listed on an agency specific schedule, in any physical format including, but not limited to, paper and e-mail.

series_title: Correspondence/Subject Files: Department or Division Heads - Other
series_description: Correspondence This series consists of incoming and outgoing letters, memoranda, faxes, notes and their attachments, not listed on an agency specific schedule, in any physical format including, but not limited to, paper and e-mail.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: Committees - Chairpersons This series consists of incoming and outgoing letters, memoranda, faxes, notes and their attachments, in any physical format including, but not limited to, paper and e-mail.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Correspondence/Subject Files: Other Officials - Historically Significant
series_description: This series consists of incoming and outgoing letters, memoranda, faxes, notes and their attachments of a historically significant nature, not listed on an agency specific schedule, in any physical format including, but not limited to, paper and e-mail.

series_title: Correspondence/Subject Files: Other Officials - Other Correspondence
series_description: This series consists of incoming and outgoing letters, memoranda, faxes, notes and their attachments, not listed on an agency specific schedule, in any physical format including, but not limited to, paper and e-mail.
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Correspondence/Subject Files: Routine, Administrative - Not Specified Elsewhere
series_description: This series consists of incoming and outgoing letters, memorandum, faxes, notes and their attachments of a routine administrative nature, not listed on an agency specific schedule, in any physical format including, but not limited to, paper and e-mail.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents the issuance of directives by the agency head outlining policy to lower levels of authority.
This series consists of lists the current or former employees and/or phone listings, office listings or lists of contracts or service providers.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series consists of materials produced during the planning, designing, and composing of a public record.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents a school or library's eligibility, competitive bidding process, discount calculation, compliance with the Children's Internet Protection Act (CIPA), funding requests, and funding disbursements related to the Schools and Libraries Program (aka E-Rate Program) of the Universal Service Fund administered by the Universal Service Administrative Company (USAC) under the oversight of the Federal Communications Commission (FCC). This series includes, but is not limited to: accreditation or charter documentation, procurement documentation, contracts, worksheets, reports, bills, invoices, and receipts. These records are closed upon the last day of the applicable funding year or the service delivery deadline for the associated funding request, whichever comes later
retention_statement: 10 Years after closed

series_description: This series documents a school or library's eligibility, competitive bidding process, discount calculation, compliance with the Children's Internet Protection Act (CIPA), funding requests, and funding disbursements related to the Schools and Libraries Program (aka E-Rate Program) of the Universal Service Fund administered by the Universal Service Administrative Company (USAC) under the oversight of the Federal Communications Commission (FCC). This series includes, but is not limited to: accreditation or charter documentation, procurement documentation, contracts, technology plans, worksheets, reports, bills, invoices, and receipts. These records are closed upon the last day of the applicable funding year or the service delivery deadline for the associated funding request, whichever comes later
retention_statement: 5 Years after closed

series_description: This series documents the implementation and control of an employee suggestion plan.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: Documents the environmental impact or major projects proposed or reviewed by agency officials
This series documents any feasibility study of a historically significant nature created by or for an agency not listed on an agency specific schedule.
Documents feasibility studies created by or for an agency, not listed on an agency specific schedule.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents locations of files, records or artifacts.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents the agency's receipt of and response to requests to view official records or retrieve information from official records as per the Virginia Freedom of Information Act (FOIA). This series may include, but is not limited to: requests, responses, and logs
retention_statement: 3 Years after last action

series_description: This series documents the application and award process, authorizations, performance monitoring, and close-out process of state, federal, and/or private grant projects participated in or awarded/administered by state agencies that contain contractual terms for records retention. This series may include, but is not limited to: accounts payables and receivables, applications, in-kind/supporting documentation, draw-down requests, evaluations, fiscal reports, notifications, modification requests, and other correspondence and reports.
retention_statement: 0 Years after terms of contract met

series_description: This series documents the application and award process, authorizations, performance monitoring, and close-out process of state, federal, and/or private grant projects participated in or awarded/administered by state agencies that do not contain contractual terms for records retention. This series may include, but is not limited to: accounts payables and receivables, applications, in-kind/supporting documentation, draw-down requests, evaluations, fiscal reports, notifications, modification requests, and other correspondence and reports
retention_statement: 3 Years after project completion

series_description: This series documents grant proposals, submitted and received, that were not awarded. This series may include, but is not limited to, letter of intent, application, proposed budget, and notification of denial.
retention_statement: 1 Year after decision

series_description: This series documents creation of graphic arts materials for internal or external use and copies of those materials.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents administrative hearings not listed on another records retention schedule.
retention_statement: 3 Years after last action

series_description: This series consists of significant material that conveys the history of the agency, its government, its accomplishments, its officials or employees. May be material of an exceptional nature that is listed as disposable in this or other general schedules. Includes, but is not limited to, scrapbooks, photographs, articles, program notes and documentation of events sponsored or funded by the agency. Also included are narratives; printed, audio, or audiovisual histories; or matters of significant historical importance.
This series documents an exceptional aspect of an agency's history or an event that would have research value beyond the agency, and is documented in records scheduled as non-permanent.
This series consists of records used for internal control of a process or action that does not act as the only record of final approval of the action or process.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Information and Public Education Records: Other Records
series_description: This series consists of public information or education campaigns and materials or items collected from various sources about the agency. Also refer to records series 100362, "Recordings, Audio and Visual."
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Information and Public Education Records: Pamphlets, Visual Aids, and/or News
series_description: Clippings Regarding Historically Significant Events This series consists of historically significant public information or education campaigns and materials or items about the agency, collected from public sources. Also refer to records series 100361, "Recordings, Audio and Visual," 100357, "Public Relations Files," and 100359, "Publications."
This series documents any internal investigation of incidents, officials, employees, departments or operations and policies not covered by another general or specific schedule.
retention_statement: 3 Years after last action

series_description: This series consists of informational, courtesy or general distribution copies of legal opinions. Additional Disposition Information: Retain as long as administratively necessary, then destroy. Non-records per Virginia Public Records Act, disposal reporting on Certificate of Records Disposal (RM-3 form) not required.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Legal Opinions: Requested by the Agency
series_description: This series consists of the opinions requested by the agency, its officials, employees or departments, from the agency counsel, special (outside) counsel, or the Attorney General's office on matters of law.

This series documents the agency process to propose or promote legislation that will affect or benefit the agency. The series consists of all drafts including marked copies of proposed legislation, correspondence, memoranda and other materials related to the consideration of legislation and its final disposition.

series_title: Litigation Case Files: Agency Record Copy
series_description: This series documents status of legal cases involving the agency, its officials, employees or departments.
retention_statement: 5 Years after event

series_title: Litigation Case Files: Other Case Files
series_description: This series documents status of legal cases involving the agency, its officials, employees or departments.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents the internal control or management of a specific function of the agency which is of historical significance.
This series documents the internal control or management of a specific function of the agency.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents that microfilm prepared by or for the agency has met specific standards.
retention_statement: 0 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Minutes of Meetings of Boards Mandated by the Code of Virginia or the Virginia
series_description: Administrative Code This series documents proceedings of meetings of boards/councils/conferences/committees required by law. Includes materials used to make or support decisions. Refer to record series 100341, 100363 and 100364 for Notes or Recordings of Minutes.

series_title: Minutes of Meetings of Other Boards /Commissions/Conferences/Committees
series_description: This series documents proceedings of meetings of informal or ad hoc advisory boards/councils/commissions/committees. Includes materials used to make or support decisions. Refer to records series 100341, 100363 and 100364 for Notes or Recordings of Minutes.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Motion Pictures: Agency Produced or Sponsored
series_description: Motion pictures or videos prepared by or for agency for a specific purpose. Does not include commercially available material.

Meetings: Non-electronic Meetings This series temporarily documents proceedings of various meetings. Includes stenographer's notes or audio or visual recordings. This does not apply to electronically held meetings. Refer to series 100338 and 100339 for Minutes.
retention_statement: 0 Years after event

series_description: This series documents the operation of an office or completion of a function. This series may include, but is not limited to: procedures, instructions, and internal guidelines.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the confidential, impartial, and informal assistance provided by an Ombudsman to help resolve concerns, conflicts, and issues between individuals and a government office. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, notes, and reporting data.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Organization Files: Administrative Structure and Management
series_description: Documents the collection of original material outlining organization or functions of the agency's major administrative units; also, material about the reorganization of the departments or management structure.
This series consists of files not directly related to the organization or reorganization of the agency's management structure.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: Documents internal assignments of parking spots.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents the registration, renewal, and certification of patents, trademarks, service marks, case marks, and copyrights. This series may include but is not limited to: applications, certificates, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 5 Years after expiration

series_description: This series consists of the collection of photographs or negatives created by or for an agency. Includes events that document the agency's organization, special ceremonies, occasions, events and facilities. May include commercially available material.
Documents the collection of photographs, negatives, image files, filmstrips or slides produced by the agency that are not considered historically significant by the agency.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: Documents the planning of administrative changes or projects, major purchases, significant events or occasions not requiring agency head approval of the details, which are historically significant.
Documents the planning of administrative changes or projects, major purchases, significant events or occasions not requiring agency head approval of the details.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Policy and Procedure Records: Agency Record Copy
series_description: Documents policy or procedural guidance issued or approved by the agency head.
Documents materials created for use in briefings, demonstrations, classes or seminars (e.g., slides, overheads, flip charts, handouts). Does not include commercially available materials.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Privacy Act: Information Request and Response Records
series_description: This series documents receipt of requests for protected information and the response to the request
retention_statement: 3 Years after last action

series_title: Privacy Act: Requests to Amend Personal Information
series_description: This series documents receipt of requests to alter or amend personal information retain by agency and response to the request
retention_statement: 3 Years after last action

series_description: This series documents registration and attendance for events, workshops, conferences, and programs offered by an agency. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, registration and payment information, release forms, and attendance records.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: Documents design, development, control, or monitoring of a specific project or group of projects that are historically significant.
Documents design, development, control or monitoring of a specific project or group of projects.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: Documents information provided to the public and business or government communities. Includes statements, visual aids, news releases and news clippings regarding historically significant events. Also, one official copy of any historically significant publications.
Documents information provided to the public and business or government communities. Includes routine records.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Publication or Duplication Masters or Proofs
series_description: Documents the approval of masters or proofs used to produce publications.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents the official release of agency publications meant for public distribution or general internal distribution

series_title: Recordings of Electronically Held Meetings of
series_description: Boards/Commissions/Conferences/Committees Having Regulatory or Decision Powers This series documents proceedings of electronically held meetings. Includes audio or visual recordings. Refer to records series 100338 for Minutes
retention_statement: 3 Years after event

series_title: Recordings of Electronically Held Meetings of
series_description: Boards/Commissions/Conferences/Committees Without Regulatory or Decision Powers This series documents proceedings of electronically held meetings. Includes audio or visual recordings. Refer to records series 100338 and 100339 for Minutes
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Recordings, Audio and Visual: Historically Significant
series_description: This series consists of audio or visual recordings, created by or for an agency, that are of an enduring historically significant nature or that describe the current function or organization of the agency's major administrative units. Commercially available material may be included, if appropriate. Does not include recordings used in lieu of minutes or as temporary transcripts of minutes.

series_title: Recordings, Audio and Visual: Other Recordings
series_description: Documents the production of audio or visual recordings, not used for security of considered historically significant. Does not include commercially available material or recordings used in lieu of minutes or as temporary transcripts of minutes.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Records Management Files: Approved Forms Masters and Supporting
series_description: Documentation Documents the development, design, approval and use of forms.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Records Management Files: Approved Retention and Disposition Schedules
series_description: This series consists of approved retention and disposition schedules, including general and specific schedules
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Records Management Files: Archival Transfer Forms
series_description: This series documents the transfer of permanent records to the Archives at the Library of Virginia. This series includes: Archival Transfer List and Receipt (ARC-1 Form), Archival Transfer Folder List (ARC-2 Form), and Archival Microform Transfer List and Receipt (ARC-3 Form).

series_title: Records Management Files: Microform Records - Inspection Reports
series_description: This series documents the inspection and approval of microfilm prepared by or for an agency. Includes copies of background densities and inspection reports
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Records Management Files: Microform Records - Processing or Methylene Blue
series_description: Tests This series documents testing required to validate the correct processing and development of microfilm
retention_statement: 0 Years after event

series_description: Documents material collected solely for reference or office library use. Generally includes printed material that is routinely distributed or collected.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents the agency process to establish regulations as part of the Virginia Administrative Code. The series consists of all drafts, including marked drafts; economic impact statements; correspondence; memoranda; and any other materials related to the establishment of regulations.

series_title: Regulatory Case Files: Final Signed Copy
series_description: This series consists of the final signed copy of any approved regulations that are part of the Virginia Administrative Code.
This series documents individual liability release statements for adults which are required for participation in various programs.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents individual liability release statements for children under the age of 18 required for participation in various programs.
retention_statement: 5 Years after birthday

series_description: Documents the creation of routine reports, of a historically significant nature, not listed on any general schedule or special schedule. This series applies only if reports are filed separately. If normally filed with any other series, the retention for that series applies (e.g., reports on Privacy Act requests have the same retention as the Privacy Act request).

Documents the creation of routine reports not listed on any general schedule or special schedule. This series applies only if reports are filed separately. If normally filed with any other series, the retention for that series applies (e.g., reports on Privacy Act requests have the same retention as the Privacy Act request).
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents agency concerns or plans regarding potentially threatening persons or situations that have not yet resulted in a specific incident report. This series may include, but is not limited to: trespass lists, reports, anecdotal notes, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: Documents the preparation of accident reports, accident investigations and safety policy statements except those records required by OSHA or the Department of Labor and Industry.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Schedule of Daily Activities: Convenience or Administrative Control
series_description: Documents the control of activities of employees other than payroll/hourly wage records. Includes diaries, logs, registers and other similar records.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Schedule of Daily Activities: Required by Law or Regulation
series_description: Documents compliance with code, law, statute or regulation requiring the control or recording of the activities of employees other that payroll/hourly wage records. Includes diaries, logs, registers and other similar records not listed on an agency specific schedule.
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: Documents the creation of duplicate copies of records, usually electronic records, created for information security purposes.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents the process and events for recognizing the service and accomplishments of employees and volunteers. The documentation of the recognition itself should be placed in the individual personnel record. This series may include, but is not limited to: nomination forms, correspondence, reports, and lists.
retention_statement: 3 Years after event

series_description: This series consists of records, files or documents, regardless of scheduled retention period, determined to be of special historic or research interest by the agency head or governing board.
Documents speeches delivered by an official acting in fulfillment of job responsibilities.
retention_statement: 0 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: Documents internal staff meetings.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: Documents the creation of surveys by or for the agency for administrative, informational or research purposes.
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Telephone Logs: Routine, Not Related to Law Enforcement or Emergency
series_description: Services Documents incoming or outgoing telephone calls.
retention_statement: 2 Months after last action

series_title: Telephone Message Slips: Relevant to Specific Actions
series_description: Documents notification of incoming calls, phone messages and/or requesting return calls. These messages have a bearing on actions or decisions taken or not taken.
retention_statement: 0 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: Documents notification of incoming calls, phone messages and/or requesting return calls. These messages document no specific actions.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: Schedules employees' time off from work, not created specifically for payroll purposes.
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: Documents copying of vital records made as a backup to prevent loss of information.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Voice Mail/Answering Machine Messages - Routine Messages
series_description: Documents the recording of incoming telephone calls.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Voice Mail/Answering Machine Messages: Relevant to Specific Actions
series_description: Documents the recording of incoming telephone calls. These messages have a bearing on actions or decisions taken or not taken.
retention_statement: 0 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: Documents the creation of records, not related to any other existing agency records series, created to forecast, monitor, control, tabulate or report the daily work activities of an individual or group other than payroll records.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series consists of work orders or production orders by the requestor. Refer to General Records Retention and Disposition Schedule No. GS106, General Service Records for additional records.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year
